snippet: The private equity firm co-founded by the Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney has agreed to buy the Apex Tool Group, a maker of hand and power tools, for $1.6 billion.
abstract: The private equity firm co-founded by the Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney has agreed to buy the Apex Tool Group, a maker of hand and power tools, for $1.6 billion.

headline.main: Bain Capital to Buy Apex Tool for $1.6 Billion
